import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DeployConfirmForm=_ref=>{let{model,onClose}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const[task,setTask]=useState([]);const[selected_task,setSelected_task]=useState(null);const[formData,setFormData]=useState({id:model.id,name:model.name,description:model.description,model_file:model.model_file,table_configuration_id:model.table_configuration_id});useEffect(()=>{// Fetch tasks from Flask backend using Axios
axios.get('http://localhost:5000/boundary/ViewTask').then(response=>{setTask(response.data);console.log(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching pulling:',error);});},[]);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(selected_task.train_model_id!=null){const confirmSubmit=window.confirm("This task is using other Model, proceed to change model?");if(confirmSubmit){try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/boundary/deployModel',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(response.status===200){alert('Deployed Successfully');onClose();navigate('/model');}}catch(error){alert('Deployed failed');onClose();navigate('/model');}}else{alert('Deployment Cancelled');onClose();navigate('/model');}}else{try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/boundary/deployModel',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(response.status===200){alert('Deployed Successfully');onClose();navigate('/model');}}catch(error){alert('Deployed failed');onClose();navigate('/model');}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"type",children:"Model Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:"type",value:selected_task,onChange:e=>setSelected_task(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",disabled:true,children:"Select Model Type"}),task.map(tk=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:tk.id,children:tk.name},tk.id))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Selected Model Type ID: ",selected_task]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:onClose,children:"Cancel"})]});};export default DeployConfirmForm;
